transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello?
Executive: Uh, sir, hi, this side Pallavi from IndiaMART.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, actually, uh, Subham ji ne aapke owner se baat ki thi Riyaz Marble mein, video meeting hui thi sir?
Customer: Hmm, nahi, owner.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Riyaz sir se hui thi unki video meeting aur sir ticket aaya tha toh woh na solve bhi ho gaya tha. But phir humne na ek feedback bheja tha sir, satisfied or not satisfied ka toh sir ne woh feedback.
Customer: Feedback diya, maine aapko not satisfied ka diya na, maine toh diya hai woh.
Executive: Haan, sir, aapke baat hui thi Rishabh ji?
Customer: Mere se baat nahi hui, khali mere se whatsapp kiya, maine aapka aaya tha woh whatsapp.
Executive: Sir, main wohi keh rahi hu Rishabh Rishabh ji ne Riyaz sir se baat kari thi aur unhone bola tha ki abhi koi issues nahi hai. Unhone pura samjha bhi diya tha, tabhi sir ne bola tha ki aap feedback.
Customer: Kya samjhaya kya fraud fraud lead mil rahi hai hum logo ko kya hai usme khali IndiaMART unko malum hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir, aapko ek lead bhi nahi mili dhai mahine ke andar hum logo ke ek dhai mahine mein ek lead bhi mili.
Customer: Kaun vishwas karega IndiaMART pe phir?
Executive: Main na aapko call escalate kar rahi hu, please aap ek minute sir aap mujhe samay dijiyega, dekhiye concerned hai tabhi hum solve karne ke bihaf pe hi aapse baat kar rahe hai, mujhe ek minute ka samay dijiye, main bas call escalate kar rahi hu to Rishabh your account manager.
Customer: Woh aapko clear kar denge kya Riyaz sir se baat hui hai, ji sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Are sir, yeh dhai mahine mein ek bhi lead nahi mili, sab fraud fraud lead mil rahi hai, jinka kaam hua hua hai woh just now mein daalte hai, jiska kaam hi mahine bhar pehle ho gaya.
Customer: Hum logo ko toh ek bhi ek ₹100 ka bhi kaam nahi mila hai, ulta IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Nahi mila hai mujhe pata hai sir aur IndiaMART pe inquiry aa rahi hai. Wahi maine aaj subah meeting ki thi Riyaz sir se aur ek aur sir se Faraz Faraz sir se kya tha sir.
Customer: Dono log se kiya tha.
Customer: Aji woh toh dono bacche hai, main hi owner hu.
Executive: Aap woh toh mera ladka hai Riyaz aap hi ka number hai, aap hi ka number hai ji sir, mujhe pata hai lekin pata hai dikkat kya ho rahi thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Lead lead jis time aati hai aur woh kitne time tak IndiaMART pe rehti hai woh turant chali bhi jaati hai, temple mein bahut zyada demand hai, theek hai? Wahi maine unko meeting mein online bula ke khud maine do lead consume karaya hai. Aadhe ghante meeting mein hum log baithe the, maine kaha dekhiye main baitha hu aapke samne lead aayegi. Refresh kiya hai, aise bhi dikh rahe hai ki haan lead aa rahi hai aur bahut jaldi sold out hoti hai. Toh maine kaha sir naya laptop se kariye, mat kariye phone se. Jahan pe itna competition hai, itne supplier hai market mein. Wahan pe aap phone pe wait karenge ki koi inquiry aapke paas aayega, baat karega ki mujhe aapse lena hai toh aisa nahi hai. Bilkul reality samjhaya hai ki bahut competition hai, aap laptop pe lagiye. Aap ek hafta lagiye, 10 din lagiye aapko result mil jayega, khud hi mere se bologe, yeh main shuru se hi keh raha hu jab se.
Customer: Woh toh sir usse laptop pe laga hua hai sir ji, laptop pe laga hua hai dhai mahine se woh toh khud hi laptop pe lage the woh aur woh mere se keh rahe the ki abhi ek hafte se nahi aa raha tha lead, theek hai? Kuch lead nahi aa rahi hai fraud fraud lead aa rahi hai koi.
Executive: Nahi nahi India main bata raha hu fraud kya hota hai, woh hota yeh hai ki jaise koi check kar raha hai, theek hai? Usne price dala ₹1 lakh. Hmm. Ab mandir actual mein banta hai 10, 11, 12 lakh ka. Theek hai? Ab woh kya hai woh batayega ki mera itna hi budget hai, kam budget hai, theek hai? Toh woh toh nahi lega woh hum logo ko bhi pata hai, koi pata hai ki jo itna bol raha hai usse baat karne ka koi fayda nahi hai. Maine unse yeh bola hai ki aap Gujarat ki jo lead hai, Madhya Pradesh area hai, theek hai, Maharashtra hai. Aap aisi jagah mein dalo jahan ke log paisa hai, trust wale hote hai. Woh trust mein jinko mandir banwana hota hai wohi log ka lead hota hai. Hmm hmm. Agar aap koi dusre region ka lead uthaoge, Delhi ka utha loge, Delhi wala kabhi nahi dega aapko. Aap Gurgaon Delhi mein bahut bilkul dekho main batau UP, Delhi, Kolkata udhar sab bekar hi hai.
Customer: Sab bekar hai, wohi maine bola Ahmedabad mein kya hota hai na.
Customer: Bhai meri baat meri baat suno, meri baat suno aap. Mere ko kahi ki bhi mat do pure India mein kahi ki mat do mujhe mere ko de do sirf Telangana ki, meri baat suno. Sirf char state ki de do Telangana ki, Andhra Pradesh ki, Tamil Nadu ki aur Karnataka ki aur koi kahi ki mat do mere ko lead.
Executive: Nahi Karnataka mat kariye pata hai kyu? Karnataka mein jo Bangalore wale hai na, unka alag hi patthar udhar ka hai jo udhar chalta hai, udhar ke supplier jude hue hai IndiaMART se. Toh woh aapki baat sahi hai lekin main mere ko toh yeh char state ka de do aap aur baki India ke UP mere ko pasand bhi nahi hai, mera zyada kya kaam dhandha sab south mein zyada hai aur meri jaan pehchan bhi hai udhar. Toh mere ko toh aapko char state bata raha hu main aapko Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Karnataka utni de do bas koi hum log badhiya baki aap Gujarat ki, Maharashtra ki sab rehne do MP, UP, Delhi sab hata do inko.
Executive: Matlab north ki lead consume matlab nahi karwana hai.
Customer: Haan north ki humare ko zarurat hi nahi hai, humare ko toh south ki de do aap, uska milne ka chances bahut zyada rehta hai.
Executive: Nahi haan bilkul rehta hai.
Customer: Karan kya hai batau ki main batau karan kya hai? Haan haan bolo karan kya rehte hai? Hmm. Woh log kaam karate hai, idhar UP, Bihar, Delhi wale toh woh yeh kya sab baal ki khaal nikalne wale hai.
Executive: Nahi woh price leke na woh phir paise usi ki baat ho jaati hai.
Customer: Bhai abhi Hyderabad hai number one pe Hyderabad Hyderabad Telangana ka aisa ekdam sahi hai woh log kaam karane wale hai, ab unko kya karte hai meri meri baat sune Hyderabad ka kaam tha. Ab yeh kya kare usko Hyderabad wale ko kya kare toh un logo ne kaam karane wala banda tha meri khud baat hui thi teen char baar mere ko phone kiya tha usne itna bada set tha woh ke bhi. Toh bola yaar koi aadmi bhai yaar koi kaam karne wale koi bata raha nahi koi ₹1000 ka farak dal raha. Koi 700 ka dal raha, koi 500 ka iske andar kitna margin hai? Toh mere ko aisa pucha woh. Main bola sir ji margin ka toh woh ek alag matter hai woh khali aapko confuse karenge kam rate deke. Hmm. Kam kam rate deke aapko karenge woh aadmi kaam karane wala tha matlab shuru ki baat hai yeh jisne jab IndiaMART se juda hu na aapse uske uske 10 din baad ki baat hai shayad mere paas unke number bhi hoge woh bole yaar phir kya mera dimag kharab ho gaya phone pe phone aa rahe hai, ab woh seth aadmi itna phone thodi uthayega. Meri baat samajh rahe ho kehne ka matlab? Ab usko khud itna busy hai ab you know 50 phone ek sath chalne lage uske paas mein aur kaam ko koi samjhna nahi hai, kaam woh kaam kaisa lega woh yeh koi samjhna nahi hai. Maine usko diye koi diya jabke kaam hai woh ₹6000 ka usko ₹2000 pe laa diye log, ₹1500 pe laa diye. Hmm hmm hmm. ₹1000 mein tak laa diye usko kaam ab batao. Woh jo kaam dikha raha hai jo photo dikha raha hai woh ₹6000 pe bhi khali 5%, 7% mazduri hai. Aur phir uska dimag hi kharab ho gaya woh bolne laga abhi baad mein dekhenge. Nahi toh us time kaam mere ko phone kiya usne. Hmm hmm. Mere ko do teen baar usne phone kiya ke aap Ramzan bhai aap mujhe bataye aap kaam karne wale ho. Lekin itne phone aa rahe ke mere ko IndiaMART mein dal toh diya mere ko sab pareshani mol le liya main. Are nahi sir IndiaMART mein log na jaane kab se jude hue hai aur kitna marble temple aur itna paisa. Ab dekho meri baat suno hum log toh aapki is baat se jude hai ab jo dekho so sare ko toh kaam milta nahi. 100 mein se 10% ko kaam mil raha hai aur kaise mil raha hai meri baat suno meri main meri sune. Ab 10% ko kaam kaise mil raha? Jaise kisi ke paas wastage pada hai patthar. Haan. Suniye ji meri baat, woh kisi bhi rate mein le sakta hai kaam. Woh khali woh dekhe chahe apan ko ₹1 lakh ghata lage ya ₹1 lakh apan ko mazduri ho ya nahi bhi ho ya apan ko ₹2 lakh ek baar is party se judna hai apan ko. Ab hum log toh ghate mein kaam karenge nahi na hum logo ko 10% toh chahiye.
Executive: Karenge nahi karenge. Ab jinke paas wastage maal pada rehta hai na. Hmm. Main bata raha hu na aapko jin khadkano wale logo ke paas wastage maal pada rehta hai woh log dekhte hai yaar apna isme se recovery karo. Hmm. Aisa hota hai iske andar mein humne toh main toh hum log toh main market mein baitha hu mere ko toh ek ek cheez ek ek patthar ki granite le lo aap Italian le lo, Makrana le lo har cheez ka knowledge hai. Hmm. Ab dekho na mere ko patthar ke mamle mein bahut jankari hai mere ko. Mere paas agar wastage pada rahega toh main dekhu yaar chalo saage saage paise aa rahe hai apne ₹1 lakh yeh samjho margin ka profit hai toh aa raha toh hai. Chahe bache kuch bhi nahi. Aisa dimag lagta hai. Sahi bol rahe hai. Bacha hua maal ja raha hai apna. Toh uski wajah se bhi competition zyada ho raha aur dusra Rajnagar Rajnagar aa gaya. Ab Rajnagar wala 700 mein le raha hai, 600 mein le raha hai. Haan. Koi 800 mein le raha hai. Yeh chakkar aa gaya isme. Aapke IndiaMART mein Makrana wale toh bahut jude hai. Bahut zyada jude hai. Phir kaha milega mein kaam? Nahi milega. Main main wohi samjhaya hu, main bata raha hu kaise milega. Hmm. Dekhiye jitne log IndiaMART pe online hai service le rakhte hai, theek hai? Haan. Ek lead jo aati hai woh sirf paanch supplier ko milti hai, aisa nahi ki woh 2500 se baat kar rahe hai, theek hai? Hmm hmm hmm. Main kyu kehta hu ki lead turant aayi, main aaj wohi samjhaya meeting mein sir ko ki jaise lead turant aayi na toh turant meri baat suno aap. Hmm. Dekho meri baat suno jinko lead nahi mili hai aur jinko lead mil chuki hai toh unko ek option toh dalo ki bhai inko le liya ek aadmi ko de dusra nahi jaye woh lead. Toh woh apna chalo dimag toh lagaye bataye toh shuru customer party ko lekin usko zyada tar party kya hoti hai jitna phone jayega uska dimag kharab ho jaata hai woh bola yaar mere ko kaam nahi karwana. Ek Kolkata mein bhi aisa Kolkata mein bhi mere se aisa aisa hi hua woh bola mera pehle man bana tha aapse kaam karane ke liye ki mere paas itne phone aa rahe hai IndiaMART walo ke supplier ke mera dimag kharab kar diya unhone. Maar phone, maar phone, maar phone, maar phone toh dimag hi kharab ho gaya kehne laga kaam karwana nahi hai sabko baad mein dekhenge. Aisa bhi bahut zyada ho raha. Hmm. Samajh rahe hai na mere kehne ka matlab yeh hai, mere ko toh aap south ke de do aur south ke phir mere aane chahiye yeh dekh lo khali. Char state bataya maine aapko. Telangana, Andhra, Tamil Nadu, Karnataka. Telangana Andhra Telangana Andhra. Karnataka, Tamil Nadu. Haan char state ho gaye na. Bas yeh lead mere paas aane chahiye inki aur zaroorat nahi hai mere ko. Hmm hmm. Baki ji baki state ki zaroorat nahi hai samajh lo Gujarat hai, MP hai. Hmm hmm. Rajasthan ki hai unki zaroorat hi nahi hai. Dekhiye dekhiye hafte ka jo lead ka balance hota hai na woh 44 hota hai, theek hai? Hmm hmm. Toh kaha aa rahi hai sir ji? Fountain fountain mila ke aati hai. Haan sab mila ke hi karenge na lead ka main balance bata raha hu ki itne ka balance hota hai usme aap fountain kariye matlab focus temple pe hona chahiye. Kyuki temple ki agar hum 100 customer se jodenge tab jaake usme se ek positive aayega. Hmm hmm. Abhi starting mein lekin bahut mehnat ab yeh mat sochiye ki aapne kisi ko ek tariq lagaiye aur usme mujhe turant return chahiye, mehnat bahut hai aapko aapko bolke unko samjhana padega na ki jaldi baazi karna padega ki paisa lagaya hai. Aap paise pe baat karenge na turant samjhane mein hum log dikkat nahi hai. Ek sahab yahi ka hai ji Delhi Faridabad yaha ka hai kya naam Meerut ka hai. Woh kya madam ka kaam toh badhiya karane ke vichar hai woh rate wali madam hai. Woh Makrana mein karane wali ko Rajnagar mein laake chhod diye. Ab Rajnagar mein woh confuse ho gayi. Takriban takriban na ek mahina ho gaya. Hmm. Ab bole mujhe yaar kisse baat karu, kisse kaam karu, kaun sahi hai, kaun galat hai. ₹3000 ki rate ko ₹800 mein leke aa gaye log. Mere baap ab yeh halat hai. Woh bola hum aaj se nahi kar denge. ₹800 mein kya lagayega woh? Aur woh bhi fitting fitting sab woh confuse ho gaye na woh toh. Woh engineer toh confuse ho gaya lekin har customer aisa nahi hota hai, bahut log ko jaldi mein hota hai ki woh paisa waisa phir nahi dekhte. Mere ko toh main aapko bataya char state ke bata diye main aapko, char state ke lead de do khali. South ke de do bas. Theek hai. Baki main phir subah Riyaz sir se meeting karke mere se baat kar lena aap yeh toh kya baccha hai kya samjhega. Nahi woh woh login karwana padta hai na IndiaMART toh woh unke paas access hai isliye unko karta hu. Theek hai phir. Theek hai sir. Theek hai sir. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive leads in 2.5 months.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.

- Feels leads are fraudulent and outdated.

- Expresses frustration with IndiaMART's service.



Resolution:

- Executive escalated the call to account manager.

- Executive explained lead generation process.

- Executive suggested focusing on specific regions.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will clarify issues with Riyaz.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, fraud leads, south india
